description:
A liquified natural gas import terminal that could become one of Europe’s largest such facilities has received financing from a dozen European and Asian banks, many of which have existing climate pledges.  A list of the 12 banks financing the proposed Stade LNG Terminal in Germany was created by Reclaim Finance, a Paris-based research organization […]

The post Climate pledges haven’t stopped these European banks from financing LNG appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Climate pledges haven’t stopped these European banks from financing LNG
